arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – The Parisian squad: 2 players injured
arts.sum: This Sunday (kick-off at 5:15 p.m., CET), first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face fifth-place Lens at the Parc des Princes on Matchday 4 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. Here is the squad called up by Parisian coach Luis Enrique. Goalkeepers – Chevalier, Safonov, Marin. Defenders – Beraldo, Hakimi, Hernandez, Kamara, Marquinhos, Mendes, Pacho, Zabarnyi. arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain and Racing Club de Lens go head-to-head at the Parc des Princes on Sunday in Ligue 1 action. Both sides will be looking to continue their positive starts to the season, with PSG sitting top of the table and Lens in sixth.
